strapiPost.title: Outside The Box
strapiPost.content:
Applications are open for a new program at The Collaborative, a University of Arkansas education and research center in Bentonville.

  • Preparing greatness: The Greenhouse Outdoor Recreation Program (GORP) was created to support outdoor recreation entrepreneurs with the resources they need to be successful. From workshops to mentorships to a co-working space, the program is ready to equip. 
  • Built for growth: The program is 12 weeks long and offers up to $15k in “non-dilutive funding” among other developmental services. The first GORP cohort will be held in the winter/spring of 2022. 

Apply and find more information HERE.
